summary:
Discord - Play the Game

 $CHAMP Token - Ultimate Champions is a Free to Play Fantasy Sports platform powered by NFTs.

 Licensed basketball clubs - 3

 Licensed football clubs - 5

 Listing Date - 25 Jul, 2022

 Listing Time - 6pm CET

 Circulating market cap - $1.2M

 Fully Diluted market cap - $35M

 One token to power all sports - 25% of all revenues generated on the Ultimate Champions platform will circle back into the $CHAMP token value! This revenue sharing strategy applies for Football, Basketball and any other sport we add to the platform.

 Tokenomics - The $CHAMP token allocations will unlock progressively over 33 months.

play to earn20%

UNAGI23%

staking12%

public sale5%

private sale10%

advisors4%

reserve26%

 Team of 20 people - Ultimate Champions was founded by ex-Ubisoft Studio managers and industry experts.

 Seed Investors - business angels

Mario GötzeProfessional Footballer & World Cup winner

 Ultimate Champions is live - Ultimate Champions is completely free-to-play and live now! Time to start your journey.
